content:
Prev: Middle Station Up: Rio de Janeiro Next: Sugarloaf View

Uni Rio And Copacabana



The SoCG 2013 site is at the lower right, the military circle where we ate our lunches is the small red building in the lower center, and the Copacabana where many attendees stayed is the sweep of beach in the upper half of the view.
Taken Thursday, June 20, 2013, 11:27:06AM. Original image size: 3888x2187, 931kb
Technical details: Canon EOS 40D, 1/60s@ F11, ISO 100, 17-85mm f/4-5.6, ... ], 20mm (32mm equiv)
